title: Bug 49109RealmBase.authenticate uses toString on byte array
description: Bug 49109RealmBase.authenticate uses toString on byte array
OB: catalina.realm.RealmBase.authenticate(String username, byte[] credentials)has the following code:return (authenticate(username, credentials.toString()));This looks wrong, as credentials is a byte array.It should probably be:return (authenticate(username, new String(credentials[,charset])));
